data.name: Hazard Ops: Assault Pack
data.detailed_description:
Brutal carnage and hard-hitting action that will teach even veteran players the meaning of fear: That’s the essence of Hazard Ops. If you want to be more than cannon fodder on these battlefields, you’ve really got to bring it!

This pack turns your enemies into Swiss cheese. No one can escape the dense volley of bullets that pour out of these babies. These skull-poppin’ assault rifles combine brutal power with a stylish look. If you want to be on the safe side, complete your rain of terror with the included Cyclone Turrets and the obliterating Big Time Shotgun.

Weapons & Mods

  • Assault XM8 (permanent)
  • Assault MG3 (7 days)
  • Big Time M870-ZK Box
  • AR Reflex Scope (7 days)
  • AR High-Capacity Mag (7 days)

Costumes

  • SWAT Raid (M) (permanent)
  • SWAT Raid (F) (permanent)

Consumables

  • 5x Cyclone Turret
  • 5x Revive Token
  • 1x Key Card
  • 1x Difficulty Unlock

Lock and load, and let the carnage begin!

data.short_description: No one can escape these skull-poppin’ assault rifles! This pack turns your enemies into Swiss cheese. And if anyone doesn’t get mowed down by the dense volley of bullets, just blast ‘em with your Big Time Shotgun!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Vista or Windows 7
  • Processor: Pentium 4 2.0GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 7600GT (must support Shader Model 3.0)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 7/Windows 8
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo, Core 2 Quad, i7
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 9800GT, GT240 (4800 series, HD5600 series)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
